name: utakata-umigame
description: Q&A-based web chat application by node.js
author: pb10001 <atihsa.mihs.ne.ho.da@gmail.com>

scripts.postinstall: browserify src/main.js -o client/js/bundle.js && browserify src/top.js -o client/js/top.js &&  uglifyjs -c -o client/js/bundle.min.js client/js/bundle.js &&  uglifyjs -c -o client/js/top.min.js client/js/top.js
